_comment: Training Pipeline Configuration - Copy this to pipeline_config.json and customize

document_sources._comment: Add documentation directories to process. Leave empty [] to use only audio.

filtering._comment_min_code_lines: Minimum lines of code changed in a commit
filtering._comment_max_commits: Maximum number of commits to process
filtering._comment_top_k_matches: Number of knowledge sources to match per commit

confidence._comment: Minimum semantic similarity score (0.0-1.0). Lower = more pairs but lower quality

_comment_code_extensions: File extensions to include from git commits
